channel.title: Deobs, Mirrors and Trolling
channel.description:
I would of posted this in MoparScape General Discussion, but it says don't post questions...
When browsing forums, and it's generally in the server sections that I see it, I keep coming across three words that I don't really understand:
[ul][li]Deob (i.e. 317 Deob)[/li] [li]Mirror (i.e. when downloading, some people put "mirror" links?)[/li] [li]Trolling (one for forums in general i.e. "Don't troll my topic!")[/ul]
Someone please explain, am just curious.

item.title: Deobs, Mirrors and Trolling
item.dc:creator: @Lust.BS Lust.BS
item.description:
@Lust.BS wrote:

Lmao. Okay cheers guys.

Read full topic

item.title: Deobs, Mirrors and Trolling
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Deob - Deobfuscation, google it.

Mirror - A file server that contains a duplicate set of files of another file server, thereby sharing the burden of distribution to ensure rapid availability of data when there is heavy demand.

Definition of trolling, you gotta love urban dictionary.
Trolling - Being a prick on the internet because you can. Typically unleashing one or more cynical or sarcastic remarks on an innocent by-stander, because it’s the internet and, hey, you can.
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 21-10-2009, 02:21:29[/size][hr]Aw, Kihomura got here first ;(

Read full topic

item.title: Deobs, Mirrors and Trolling
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Deob - http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Obfuscated_code
Mirror - An alternative download link to the one provided
Trolling - Going off-topic or just saying random bullshit

Read full topic
